Articles.Content:
Welcome to The Air war. 

THE RULES

1. No intentional ramming*

2. Props are only allowed offshore on aircraft carriers with other prop aircraft.

3. Missiles allowed

4. anti-air is allowed

5.All files must be saved files for everything to work

6. historical aircraft files only.

7.bombers and nukes are only allowed if there is war declared between two or more parties.

8. ALL aircraft must have an AI pilot.

* To prevent fratricide
